Welcome to Redbits’s documentation!¶

class application.Application(master=None)¶

The frontend of this application.

Example:

import Tkinter as tk
from redbits import Application
root = tk.Tk()
app = Application(master=root)
app.mainloop()
root.destroy()
class redbits.Redbits(foreground=16711680, background=0)¶

This class stylizes png images.

Example:

from redbits import Redbits
rb = Redbits(foreground_color, background_color)
stylized_image = rb.process(image)
Parameters:
  • foreground – (unsigned integer) Foreground color as a hexidecimal.
  • background – (unsigned integer) Background color as a hexidecimal.
Todo:
  • Allow user to select output size
  • Allow User to select box density of output image
process(pil_image)¶

Processes an image.

Parameters:pil_image – (PIL.Image) The image to process.
